com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font

Interface Font

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cleanable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitmapFont, TrueTypeFont

    public interface Font
extends Cleanable
    An abstraction for all font types.
    Author:
    wessles

      static int ANTI_TEXTURE_BLEEDING_MARGIN
      A margin for preventing texture bleeding.
      static int STANDARD_CHARACTERS
      The bare-minimum amount of characters.

      • getMaxWidth

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAverageWidth

        float getAverageWidth(int length)
        Parameters:
        length - The length of a string
        Returns:
        the average width of all number/letter characters, multiplied by a certain length

      • getFontTexture

        Returns:
